page.title: 06PLAYING OUTDOORS
page.content: My name is Hayley, I am 7 years old. These are some of the games Iplay outside:- 1. Making daisy chains in summer 2. Hop scotch 3. Ball (throwing and catching) 4. What's the timeMr. Wolf? 5. Tig (running and chasing) 6. Skipping For Hop sotch a stone is thrown on to squares on a grid, you hop on the square except the one with the stone on it. What's the time Mr. Wolf is also a running and chasing game. Everybody has to ask the wolf what the time is, when he says dinnnertime everybody runs away trying not to get caught.
